srcField.title: Source Field
srcField.description: Field to search for a timestamp

defaultTimezone.title: Default Timezone
defaultTimezone.description: Timezone to assign to timestamps without timezone info.

timeExpression.title: Time Expression
timeExpression.description: Expression to use to format time. Current Time, as a Javascript Date object, is in global `time`.  You can access other fields' values via __e.<fieldName>.

offset.title: Start Scan Offset
offset.description: The offset into the string from where to look for a timestamp

maxLen.title: Max Timestamp Scan Depth
maxLen.description: Maximum string length where to look for a timestamp

defaultTime.title: Default Time
defaultTime.description: How to set the time field if no timestamp is found

latestDateAllowed.title: Future timestamp allowed
latestDateAllowed.description: The latest timestamp value allowed relative to now. E.g., +42days. Parsed values after this date will be set to Default Time.

earliestDateAllowed.title: Earliest timestamp allowed
earliestDateAllowed.description: The earliest timestamp value allowed relative to now. E.g., -42years. Parsed values prior to this date will be set to Default Time.

timestamps.title: Additional Timestamps
timestamps.description: Add Regex/Strptime pairs to extract additional timestamp formats.

regex.title: Regex
regex.description: Regex with capturing group 1 matching the timestamp.

strptime.title: Strptime Format
strptime.description: Select or enter strptime format for the captured timestamp.
